data.subject: URGENT: Verify your PayPal account
data.text:
Dear customer,

Your PayPal account has been locked due to suspicious activity. Click here to verify your account immediately:

http://paypal-secure-verify.com/login

If you do not verify within 24 hours, your account will be permanently suspended.

Thank you,
PayPal Security Team
